attributes.action: Mandatory Health Testing for Breeding Dogs
attributes.additional_details:
No animal should be bred to suffer.
This petition calls for the mandatory health testing of dogs used for breeding purposes to prevent defective genes and life-threatening illnesses passing to further generations of puppies. It would be necessary to work alongside the Kennel Club and other animal welfare organisations to establish a thorough screening and registration process to allow anyone to use a dog for breeding.
